name: Zombie Quarantine
description: Lead survivors out of 20 different complex mazes while quarantining or curing the infected in this fun puzzle game that's sure to test every ounce of your mental skills. Get close and personal by playing not only from above in 2D but also in 3D as you scour every inch of the maze for the best possible route.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit) Процессор: Intel or AMD New Generation Dual Core 2.0GHz CPU Оперативная память: 2 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: NVIDIA 8800 or ATI 3850 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 100 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit) Процессор: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent Оперативная память: 8 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 100 MB
